text: Hey, Sorry it has taking me a bit to respond to your show reel. I have viewed it and the presentation looks really nice. The way you laid out your work is really good. But i want to ask. where do you want to go. organic or hard surface. It seems your more interested in organic, which is nothing wrong with that.

You only show a wire frame on the insect which is great, but on the rest you don't show wire frame breakdown. This will be hard for a recruiter or even a lead modeller to judge your work and how you model. As they cant tell if the topology is good or bad.

Your reel is really nice, but wire frame is a must on all your work. Do you want to go into VFX or games? because it seems some of your pieces look low rez. As there are no wire frame its hard to tell.
If you have any questions please ask.
